lines.text: And I'm still in love with you.
And I always will be. Remember that.
I'll never let you go. Never, never, never.
When I looked at you, exotic words drifted across the mirror of my mind like clouds across the summer sky.
There's nothing wrong with Ellen. It's just that she loves too much.
The walls are as thin as paper and the acoustics disgustingly perfect.
I keep forgetting you can't draw a deep breath without being heard all over the house!
Let's change the name of the place from Back Of The Moon to Goldfish Manor.
